A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m no die hard Star Wars fanatic\, but I’ve seen them all more than once. That said\, I was very disappointed with this movie\, and seriously almost fell asleep once or twice. They tried to inject humor a lot of places and most of them weren’t funny at all. The new villains came across like cartoon characters\, and acting / directing also came out awkward many times. This is by far my least favorite movie in the Star Wars franchise.
